nodes.text: Ruggers were fluffy herbivorous rodents native to the forest moon of Endor, and were considered cute to many species in the galaxy. They lived in the planetoid's grassy plains (yellow-furred) or high in the trees (greenish white-furred), eating nuts and berries, and hibernating in the cold winter seasons. Among their adaptations, they had sharp, strong incisors for nut-cracking and suction-like foot pads for stability and grasping. Ruggers of both species were common favored prey of Yuzzum and temptors.
Domestic ruggers were kept as pets by the wealthy on Coruscant and had white fur.
